SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, u.username, ui.truename, a.bank_balance+a.bank_frost+a.bank_await AS bankTotal, a.account_id, a.bank_balance, a.bank_frost, a.bank_await, a.bank_wait_repay, a.bank_balance_cash, a.bank_frost_cash, a.id, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN a.user_id ELSE su.spreads_user_id END AS hyd_id FROM ht_account a LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ui ON a.user_id = ui.user_id
LEFT JOIN ht_r_user su ON a.user_id = su.user_id where 1=1
AND a.account_id LIKE CONCAT( #{accountSrch}, '%')
) a LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou` ON `ou`.hyd_id = a.hyd_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od` ON `od`.`id` = `ou`.`departmentid` AND `od`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od2` ON `od2`.`id` = `od`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od3` ON `od3`.`id` = `od2`.`parentid` WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.user_id, u.username, ui2.truename AS referrer_true_name, u.mobile, CASE ui.role_id WHEN 1 THEN '出借人' WHEN 2 THEN '借款人' END AS roleid , ui.attribute AS user_attribute, ui.truename, spu.username AS referrer_name, a.bank_total AS bankTotal, a.account_id,
a.bank_balance, a.bank_frost, a.bank_await, a.bank_wait_repay, a.bank_balance_cash, a.bank_frost_cash, a.id, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN a.user_id ELSE su.spreads_user_id END AS hyd_id, su.spreads_user_id, a.plan_balance, a.plan_frost, a.plan_account_wait,
a.account_id as account, `od3`.`name` AS `regionName`, `od2`.`name` AS `branchName`, `od`.`name` AS `departmentName`, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = '1' THEN `od6`.`name` WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN `od3`.`name` ELSE `od9`.`name` END `user_region_name`, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = '1' THEN `od5`.`name` WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN `od2`.`name` ELSE `od8`.`name` END `user_branch_name`, CASE WHEN ui.attribute = '1' THEN `od4`.`name` WHEN ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3 THEN `od`.`name` ELSE `od7`.`name` END `user_department_name`, `od6`.`name` AS `referrer_region_name`, `od5`.`name` AS `referrer_branch_name`, `od4`.`name` AS `referrer_department_name` FROM ht_account a LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ui ON a.user_id = ui.user_id
LEFT JOIN ht_r_user su ON a.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ui2 ON ui2.user_id = su.spreads_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user spu ON spu.user_id = su.spreads_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou` ON `ou`.hyd_id = a.user_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') AND (ui.attribute = 2 OR ui.attribute = 3) LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od` ON `od`.`id` = `ou`.`departmentid` AND `od`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od2` ON `od2`.`id` = `od`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od3` ON `od3`.`id` = `od2`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou2` ON `ou2`.hyd_id = su.spreads_user_id AND ou2.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') AND ui.attribute <> 2 AND ui.attribute <> 3 LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od7` ON `od7`.`id` = `ou2`.`departmentid` AND `od7`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od8` ON `od8`.`id` = `od7`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od9` ON `od9`.`id` = `od8`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou1` ON `ou1`.hyd_id = su.spreads_user_id AND ou1.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od4` ON `od4`.`id` = `ou1`.`departmentid` AND `od4`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od5` ON `od5`.`id` = `od4`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od6` ON `od6`.`id` = `od5`.`parentid` where 1=1
AND a.account_id LIKE CONCAT( #{accountSrch}, '%')
ORDER BY a.user_id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
